# items

**Instance Property**

The media items in a media item collection.

## Declaration

```swift
var items: [MPMediaItem] { get }
```

## Using a media item collection

- **representativeItem**: A media item whose properties are representative of the other media items in a collection.
- **count**: The number of media items in a collection.
- **mediaTypes**: The types of the media items in a collection.
